Constructor Detail

VASTAdSpot

public VASTAdSpot(int time,
                  URL clickURL,
                  List<URL> trackingURLs,
                  URL vastURL)
Initialize a VASTAdSpot using the specified data

Parameters:
time - the time at which the VASTAdSpot should play
clickURL - the clickthrough URL
trackingURLs - the tracking URLs that should be pinged when this ad plays
vastURL - the VAST URL containing the VAST compliant XML for this ad spot

VASTAdSpot

public VASTAdSpot(JSONObject data)
Initialize a VASTAdSpot using the specified data (subclasses should override this)

Parameters:
data - the NSDictionary containing the data to use to initialize this VASTAdSpot
Method Detail

update

public com.ooyala.android.item.JSONUpdatableItem.ReturnState update(JSONObject data)
Update the VASTAdSpot using the specified data (subclasses should override and call this)

Overrides:
update in class com.ooyala.android.item.OoyalaManagedAdSpot
Parameters:
data - the NSDictionary containing the data to use to update this VASTAdSpot
Returns:
ReturnState.STATE_FAIL if the parsing failed, ReturnState.STATE_MATCHED if it was successful

fetchPlaybackInfo

public boolean fetchPlaybackInfo()
Fetch the additional required info for the ad NOTE: As of right now, we only support VAST 2.0 Linear Ads. Information about Non-Linear and Companion Ads are stored in the dictionaries nonLinear and companion respectively.

Specified by:
fetchPlaybackInfo in class com.ooyala.android.item.OoyalaManagedAdSpot
Returns:
false if errors occurred, true if successful
